sections.description:
CTC Rating is the perfect plugin to enhance user interaction on your WordPress site!

ğŸ”¹ Thumbs Up/Thumbs Down: Users can quickly express their opinion by giving a thumbs up ğŸ‘ or thumbs down ğŸ‘ to your posts.

ğŸ”¹ Display Counts: Show the total number of thumbs up and thumbs down for each post, encouraging more interaction.

ğŸ”¹ View Users: Let users see who has liked or disliked a post with a simple click, displayed in an elegant modal window.

ğŸ”¹ Gutenberg Block: Seamlessly integrate the rating system into your posts with the Gutenberg block, making it easy to add the feature wherever you need it.
sections.installation:
1. Download the plugin from the WordPress plugin repository.
  2. Go to your WordPress dashboard, navigate to Plugins â†’ Add New, and upload the downloaded file.
  3. Click “Activate” to start using CTC Rating.
  4. Add the rating block to your posts via the Gutenberg editor.
